SourceAnalyzer.Name: Narvalo Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Custom C# rules used by the Narvalo projects.

Rule.Name: PrivateFieldNamesMustBeginWithUnderscore
Rule.Context: Private instance fields must start with an underscore: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private instance field starts with an underscore.

Rule.Name: PrivateStaticFieldNamesMustBeCorrectlyPrefixed
Rule.Context: Private static fields must start with "s_": {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private static field starts with "s_".

Rule.Name: PrivateConstNamesMustOnlyContainUppercaseLettersDigitsAndUnderscores
Rule.Context: Private constants must only contain uppercase letters, digits and underscores: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private constant contain only uppercase letters and underscores.

Rule.Name: PrivateMethodNamesMustEndWithUnderscore
Rule.Context: Private methods must end with an underscore: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private method ends with an underscore.

Rule.Name: InternalMethodNamesMustNotEndWithInternal
Rule.Context: Internal methods must not end with "Internal": {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of an internal method does not end with "Internal".

Rule.Name: PrivateClassNamesMustEndWithUnderscore
Rule.Context: Private classes must end with an underscore: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of a private class ends with an underscore.

Rule.Name: AbstractClassNamesMustNotEndWithBase
Rule.Context: Abstract classes must not end with "Base": {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that the name of an abstract class does not end with "Base".

Rule.Name: FileNamesMustMatchTypeNames
Rule.Context: File names must match type names: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file name matches the type name.

Rule.Name: FileNamesMustMatchExtensionClassNamesFollowedByDollarSign
Rule.Context: File names must match extension class names followed by a dollar sign: {1}.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file name matches the extension class name followed by a dollar sign.

Rule.Name: AvoidLinesExceeding120Characters
Rule.Context: Source lines should not exceed 120 characters.
Rule.Description: Verifies that source lines are not longer than 120 characters.

Rule.Name: FilesMustStartWithCopyrightText
Rule.Context: Files must start with the Narvalo copyright header.
Rule.Description: Verifies that a file starts with the Narvalo copyright header.

Rule.Name: AvoidLinesWithTrailingWhiteSpaces
Rule.Context: Source lines should not have any trailing whitespaces.
Rule.Description: Verifies that source lines do not have trailing whitespaces.
